name: MAX (HappyBoi)
description:
This game is about a little girl in apocalypse steampunk world trying to fix her robot friend by gathering 4 part that scattered around the city that infested by a monster.

You can hide form your enemy or use item to distract them.

-Item-

Flare - Make Enemy scream and run away form you.

Stone - Distract enemy that hear your footstep .

Energy Drink - Gain 1 HP

Food Can - Gain 2 HP

-Control-

WASD -  Basic Movement

Shift - Run

Ctrl - Crouch

E - Interact/Pickup

Q - Drop Item

LMB - Use Item

RMB - Aim
